mapper.insert: insert into CXHNWX.T_INJURED (ID, INJURY_NAME, ID_NO, SEX, AGE, ADDRESS, HOSPITAL, HOSPITAL_CODE, DIAGNOSIS, FEE_DETAIL_ID, SECTION, BED, CUSTOMER_ID, SIGNATURE, ACT_DATE, STATUS, HOSPITAL_GROUP, IP_ADDRESS ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{injuryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospitalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{diagnosis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feeDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{section,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{actDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hospitalGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update CXHNWX.T_INJURED set INJURY_NAME = #{injuryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_NO = #{idNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGE = #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOSPITAL = #{hospital,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOSPITAL_CODE = #{hospitalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIAGNOSIS = #{diagnosis,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEE_DETAIL_ID = #{feeDetailId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECTION = #{section,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BED = #{bed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOMER_ID = #{customerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIGNATURE = #{signature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACT_DATE = #{actDate,jdbcType=DATE}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOSPITAL_GROUP = #{hospitalGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IP_ADDRESS = #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, INJURY_NAME, ID_NO, SEX, AGE, ADDRESS, HOSPITAL, HOSPITAL_CODE, DIAGNOSIS, FEE_DETAIL_ID, SECTION, BED, CUSTOMER_ID, SIGNATURE, ACT_DATE, STATUS, HOSPITAL_GROUP, IP_ADDRESS from CXHNWX.T_INJURED where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, INJURY_NAME, ID_NO, SEX, AGE, ADDRESS, HOSPITAL, HOSPITAL_CODE, DIAGNOSIS, FEE_DETAIL_ID, SECTION, BED, CUSTOMER_ID, SIGNATURE, ACT_DATE, STATUS, HOSPITAL_GROUP, IP_ADDRESS from CXHNWX.T_INJURED
